Self.Wiki: Determines the parameters for world tendency effects.

pcJudgeUnderWB.Wiki: The value that triggers the black player world tendency state.

pcJudgeTopWB.Wiki: The value that triggers the white player world tendency state.

pcJudgeUnderLR.Wiki: The value that triggers the left player world tendency state.

pcJudgeTopLR.Wiki: The value that triggers the right player world tendency state.

areaJudgeUnderWB.Wiki: The value that triggers the black area world tendency state.

areaJudgeTopWB.Wiki: The value that triggers the white area world tendency state.

areaJudgeUnderLR.Wiki: The value that triggers the left area world tendency state.

areaJudgeTopLR.Wiki: The value that triggers the right area world tendency state.
